          .timeline-item{ position:relative; margin:0 0 2rem 0; }
          .timeline-item::before{
            content:""; position:absolute; left:-1.63rem; top:.35rem;
            width:.8rem; height:.8rem; background:#2986cc; border-radius:50%;
            border:2px solid #fff; box-shadow:0 0 0 3px #2986cc55;
          }
          .timeline-item h4{ margin:0 0 .35rem 0; font-size:1.15rem; font-weight:800; }
          .timeline-item strong{ display:block; font-weight:700; margin:.15rem 0 .15rem; }
          .timeline-item p{ margin:0; color:#555; }

          /* anchor offset: make heading-id stop below the top safely */
          .timeline-item span[id]{ scroll-margin-top:110px; }

          /* kill browser default target/focus rings that can look weird near the left line */
          span[id]:target{ outline:0 !important; }
          a:focus, span:focus{ outline:none !important; }
          a{ -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; }

          /* make the section breathe more on wide pages */
          .page-full .content{ max-width:1100px; margin-inline:auto; }
        </style>

<script>
  // Smooth scroll WITHOUT changing the hash (avoids browser target highlight artefacts)
  document.querySelectorAll('.js-jump').forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
      const sel = btn.getAttribute('href');
      const targetSpan = document.querySelector(sel);
      if(!targetSpan) return;

      // scroll to the span (offset handled by CSS scroll-margin-top)
      targetSpan.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth', block:'start'});

      // optional: subtle highlight on the parent item
      const item = targetSpan.closest('.timeline-item');
      if(item){
        item.classList.add('js-hi');
        setTimeout(()=>item.classList.remove('js-hi'), 1600);
      }
    });
  });

  // tiny highlight style injected here (kept inline to avoid raw css blocks)
  (function(){
    const s = document.createElement('style');
    s.textContent = `.timeline-item.js-hi{ background:#e9f3ff; border-radius:8px; padding-left:.6rem; }`;
    document.head.appendChild(s);
  })();
</script>
